messages.ssml: <speak> Hello and welcome to the University of Rhode Island course catalog! <break time="1s" /> I am looking forward to assisting you with your quest to find course information. Just say help if you need guidance using the application. What can I help you with? </speak>
messages.displayText: Hello and welcome to URI Course Catalog!  You can look up things such as courses of a subject in a range, specific courses, and answers to frequently asked questions. What can I help you with?

messages.text: Hello and welcome to the University of Rhode Island's Course Catalog!  Over the phone I am limited to only answering frequently asked questions about the university.  For specific course look-ups, please use our Google Action.  What can I help you with?

messages.speech: Hello and welcome to URI Course Catalog!  You can look up things such as courses of a subject in a range, specific courses, and answers to frequently asked questions.  What can I help you with?
